MediaSourceCanConstructInDedicatedWorker.summary: The canConstructInDedicatedWorker static property of the interface returns true if MediaSource worker support is implemented, providing a low-latency feature detection mechanism.

remarks.para: If this were not available, the alternative would be a much higher latency approach such as attempting the creation of a MediaSource object from a dedicated worker and transferring the result back to the main thread.

-MSE-in-Workers Demo by Matt Wolenetz
-{{domxref("Media Source Extensions API", "Media Source Extensions API", "", "nocode")}}
-
-

MediaSourceCanConstructInDedicatedWorker.value: A boolean. Returns true if MediaSource worker support is implemented, or false otherwise.
